Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.7 Pañhāvāra » 21.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 21.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Āsevana
Ajjhattattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Āsevana
40.
2836Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—  purimā purimā ajjhattā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ajjhattānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo. Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa…  anulomaṃ vodānassa…  gotrabhu maggassa…  vodānaṃ maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2837Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—  purimā purimā…pe… . (Ajjhattasadisaṃyeva.)
